actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from Army, OMB.

official_title: A bill to modify the flood control project for the town of Niobrara, Nebraska.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to reroute Nebraska Highway Numbered 12, with the necessary connections to Nebraska Highway Numbered 14, through the relocated town of Niobrara, Nebraska as part of the flood control project for that city.

titles.title: A bill to modify the flood control project for the town of Niobrara, Nebraska.
